100% Local & Private

Local context engine for AI coding assistants

Signal over noise. HugeContext indexes your codebase locally and delivers the exact context your AI needs ‚Äî nothing more, nothing less.

Why local context matters

Generic AI assistants waste tokens on irrelevant code. HugeContext delivers precisely what matters.

Runs fully local

Your code never leaves your machine. Index, query, and retrieve ‚Äî all on localhost. Complete privacy by design.

Intent-aware retrieval

Bug? Refactor? Understanding? HugeContext detects your intent and adjusts its search strategy automatically.

Instant context

Local ONNX inference with optimized embeddings. Sub-second semantic search across your entire codebase.

Runs fully local. Your code never leaves this machine.

How it works

From install to context in under 2 minutes. Zero configuration required.

01

Index your repo

Open any project folder. HugeContext automatically indexes every file, function, and import. The embedding model downloads once (~23MB) and runs locally via ONNX.

$ code --install-extension hugecontext.vsix
02

Connect your assistant

One-click MCP setup from the dashboard. Works with Claude Desktop, Cursor, Kilo Code, VS Code Copilot, Gemini Code Assist, and more.

Claude Cursor Kilo Code VS Code Gemini Warp
03

Get ranked context

Your AI queries HugeContext and receives precisely relevant snippets. Quality-first filtering ensures only high-similarity results make it through.

üîç Debug
‚ö° Refactor
üìñ Understand
‚úì Tests

Model Context Protocol

Simple configuration

One MCP config works globally with all your projects. The server automatically detects your active workspace.

mcp.json 

  "mcpServers": 
    "hugecontext": 
      "command": "node",
      "args": [
        "/path/to/HugeContext/dist/mcp-cli.js"
      ]
query_context
MCP Tool 

  "query": "how does authentication work?",
  "workspace": "/Users/dev/my-project"


// Response includes:
// - Ranked code snippets by similarity
// - File paths and line numbers
// - Intent-adjusted filtering
Multi-workspace support
Auto workspace detection
Real-time index updates

Stop guessing what your AI sees. Control the context.

Install HugeContext and give your AI assistant the context it actually needs. Free for personal and internal use.

Install HugeContext View Documentation
$ code --install-extension hugecontext.vsix
